title: A Frozen Potato
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, we take it easy, catching up on our 2020 thus far and discussing whatever random topics come to mind.

Black Business of the Week - The Honey Pot (Plant-based hygiene products) https://thehoneypot.co

Thank you to our Sponsors:
Bevel - This episode is brought to you by Bevel, a head-to-toe personal care brand built for Black Men. This year Bevel is introducing a new lineup of products built for your skin, and your hair. We’d like to introduce you to the Bevel Deodorant; an aluminum free deodorant that goes on clear with no lines, streaks or clumps and stays strong to fight against odor for up to 48 hours. The Bevel Bar Soap; a sulfate-free exfoliating bar soap that’s dermatologist tested and infused with Shea and cocoa butter. Lastly; meet the Bevel Body Wash; made with the freshest ingredients, like Argan Oil, Charcoal and Jojoba Esters, to exfoliate, nourish and renew sensitive skin. So stop what you’re doing and check out this new line of Bevel products today at https://getbevel.com And don’t forget to check out Bevel’s sister brand FORM Beauty. Available at https://www.sephora.com and https://formbeauty.com

Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast

Have a GREAT day!
